description:
"Unbelievable shift! Yesterday I didn't even have two nickels to rub together...today I came into EXACTLY $200.00! It was unreal how this happened!" Laura Cancinos

***************************************************************

This is not a course about how to make more money or how to find your next work-from-home program. This is a course about how to shift your mindset around the issue of money.

It’s time to take off the lid to your negative money story and break free once and for all from any self-created restrictions that there is never enough, that money is evil and that people who have it are evil also.

Instead, set yourself free from any negative thinking patterns so you can create the life that you truly desire to live.

Do you want to work from anywhere on the planet?

Do you want passive, generous and multiple streams of income?

Do you want to work whenever you want to, with whomever you want to?

Then this course is for you!

This is a course about the metaphysics of money. These easily understandable concepts taught in this course along with your participation in the exercises for the next 30 days, will shift your energy field around the issue of money – for the better.

If freedom is what you want, this course if for you.

If you are longing for a new, powerful and positive story around money, this course is for you.
title: Prosperity and Metaphysics: Open the Channels of Prosperity
